data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Andrade, Marcelo C., Ota, Rafaela P., Bastos, Douglas A., Jégu, Michel (2016): A new large Myloplus Gill 1896 from rio Negro basin, Brazilian Amazon (Characiformes: Serrasalmidae). Zootaxa 4205 (6): 571-580, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4205.6.5|12 occurrences
